.. _`cs-web-components-base-overlays.constants.__module__`:

=================
Overlay-Constants
=================

.. contents:: Local Navigation
   :local:
   :depth: 2

Description
===========



Constants for use with overlays.

These are exported as fields of
:ref:`cs-web-components-base-overlays.index.__module__`.
Use them like:

.. code-block:: none

   import {Overlays} from 'cs-web-components-base';

   const {HorizontalAlignment} = Overlays;


Contents
========

Functions
---------


Constants
---------


.. _`cs-web-components-base-overlays.constants.HorizontalAlignment`:

**HorizontalAlignment**: An enumeration for specifying horizontal alignment for
aligned/layouted overlays. Values are

- ``HorizontalAlignment.LEFT``
- ``HorizontalAlignment.RIGHT``

.. _`cs-web-components-base-overlays.constants.HorizontalAlignmentType`:

**HorizontalAlignmentType**: PropType for HorizontalAlignment property.

.. _`cs-web-components-base-overlays.constants.VerticalAlignment`:

**VerticalAlignment**: An enumeration for specifying vertical alignment for
aligned/layouted overlays. Values are

- ``VerticalAlignment.BOTTOM``
- ``VerticalAlignment.TOP``

.. _`cs-web-components-base-overlays.constants.VerticalAlignmentType`:

**VerticalAlignmentType**: PropType for VerticalAlignment property.
